short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Has some search bars and links and stuff.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A nice new tab page replacement with search bars for Google, Youtube, and Wikipedia. There are also useful links to websites at the bottom. The page is responsive: it changes from side-by-side search bars for the 3 websites, to the 3 websites listed on top of each other.
